desc: Bright, compact and durable LED headlights and tail lights for skateboards, helmets, bikes, onewheels and more. USB-C rechargeable and up to 1000 lumens per light.

layout.text: "ShredLights are the truth! The lights are quality, durable and the USB-C port is covered. The mounts install very easily, and the different light modes are on point. These are plenty bright to see in front of you at dusk or at night. The price definitely reflects the quality" - Ronjaye from Tuscon
